message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
Iterator<Row> iterator = worksheet.iterator();
// Skip the first row (header)
if (iterator.hasNext()) {
    iterator.next();
}
while (iterator.hasNext()) {
    Row nextRow = iterator.next();
    // Rest of your code...
}
<<<explanation>>>: To skip the first row (header) in your Excel file, you can simply call iterator.next() before entering the while loop. This will move the iterator to the next row, effectively skipping the header row.
